query:
SELECT i.vesselTagNumber, 
       COUNT(CASE WHEN LOWER(t.location) LIKE '%north%' OR LOWER(t.component) LIKE '%north%' THEN 1 END) as north_count,
       COUNT(CASE WHEN LOWER(t.location) LIKE '%south%' OR LOWER(t.component) LIKE '%south%' THEN 1 END) as south_count,
       COUNT(CASE WHEN LOWER(t.location) LIKE '%east%' OR LOWER(t.component) LIKE '%east%' THEN 1 END) as east_count,
       COUNT(CASE WHEN LOWER(t.location) LIKE '%west%' OR LOWER(t.component) LIKE '%west%' THEN 1 END) as west_count
FROM inspections i
LEFT JOIN tmlReadings t ON i.id = t.inspectionId
GROUP BY i.vesselTagNumber
HAVING north_count > 0 OR south_count > 0 OR west_count > 0
LIMIT 20;

       COUNT(CASE WHEN LOWER(t.location) LIKE '%west%' OR LOWER(t.component) LIKE '%west%' THEN 1 END) as west_count
FROM inspections i
LEFT JOIN tmlReadings t ON i.id = t.inspectionId
GROUP BY i.vesselTagNumber
